articles.title: U.S., EU strike LNG deal as Europe seeks to cut Russian gas - Reuters
articles.description: The United States will work to supply 15 billion cubic metres of liquefied natural gas (LNG) to the European Union this year to help it wean off Russian energy supplies, the transatlantic partners said on Friday.
